title: Renewable energy sector to provide momentum to Indian economy: Pralhad Joshi
description: Union Minister Pralhad Joshi emphasized the growth of India's renewable energy sector at the BNEF Summit in New Delhi. He highlighted government initiatives, including a PLI Scheme for solar PV modules and policies for grid storage. India's renewable energy capacity has increased significantly, with major strides in solar power and green hydrogen production.
